name: copulation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of having sex: The carvings often feature elaborate scenes of copulation. Among grey seals, copulation may occur either on land or in the water. See
copulate
More examplesFewer examplesThey had been interrupted in the act of copulation. After copulation, the male may leave to search for another receptive female.All the while, the petty business of life continues - eating, drinking, copulation.
